compounddef.compoundname: ArmorTools - 002 - The quickest way to use ArmorTools

detaileddescription.para: This class is a very powerful tool, as I want to show you here. Instead of writing hundreds of lines of code, you can interact with aRMOR in few function calls. The most of times you'll use this interface in this way.

this code was written only for your understanding. Probably it won't compile.
- 002 - The quickest way to use ArmorTools
